meanings.sent1: The weevilly flour had tiny holes from the pests.
meanings.sent2: The farmer discovered his weevilly crops were ruined.
meanings.sent3: The weevilly bread was so full of holes, it looked like Swiss cheese!
meanings.sent4: The weevilly fields were a patchwork of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The weevilly infestation left a trail of devastation in its wake.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a weevil.
meanings.sent1: The weevilly bug had a long snout and small body.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a weevilly plant that attracted the insects.
meanings.sent3: The weevilly toy beetle was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her weevilly earrings dangled like tiny insects from her ears.
meanings.sent5: The weevilly pattern on the fabric looked like a field of tiny bugs.
